text: Beautiful Dreamers is a 1990 Canadian drama movie directed by first time director John Kent Harrison. It stars Colm Feore, Rip Torn, Colin Fox, Wendel Meldrum, Sheila McCarthy and was distributed by C/FP Distribution. ==Other websites== *. Category:1990 drama movies Category:Canadian drama movies Category:Movies directed by John Kent Harrison Category:Movies set in the 19th century
title: Beautiful Dreamers
